explorer.scanComplete: Scan complete, no new conversations found

settings.layoutDensityDescription: Adjust the spacing of the interface

modal.resetDatabaseConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the database? This will delete all data.
modal.deleteDatabaseConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all stored data? This cannot be undone.

toast.scanComplete: Scan complete, no new conversations found
toast.scanStarted: Library scan started in background tab
toast.feedbackFailed: Failed to send feedback. Please try again later.
toast.feedbackRateLimit: Please wait a moment before sending another feedback.
toast.interfaceUpdated: Google AI Studio interface updated. Please update the extension or wait for a fix.
toast.noContentToExport: No content found. Please open the conversation in AI Studio so the extension can record it, then try again.
toast.importAiStudioSystemSuccess: Imported {{count}} system prompt(s) from AI Studio
toast.importAiStudioSystemNoData: No AI Studio system instructions found in this page
toast.importAiStudioSystemInvalid: Invalid AI Studio system instructions data
toast.importAiStudioSystemFailed: Failed to import AI Studio system instructions

prompts.variablePromptModalIntro: You can use variables in prompt content with double curly braces. When you copy a prompt that contains variables, you'll be asked to fill in their values.
prompts.fillVariablesIntro: This prompt contains variables. Enter a value for each, then copy.
prompts.title: Title
prompts.titleMaxLength: Title must be at most {{count}} characters

about.title: About
about.appName: Better Sidebar for Google AI Studio

sponsor.title: Support Development
sponsor.enjoying: Enjoying Better Sidebar for Google AI Studio?
sponsor.description: This project is free to use. If it helps you be more productive, consider supporting its development!

data.scanLibraryDescription: Scan your AI Studio library to populate the explorer
data.importConversationDataDescription: Import conversation history from a ZIP exported from Google AI Studio
data.resetDatabaseDescription: Delete all stored data (folders, tags, cache). This cannot be undone.
data.exportDataDescription: Download a SQL dump backup of your organization

explorerSettings.defaultViewModeDescription: How items are displayed in the explorer
explorerSettings.defaultSortOrderDescription: How items are sorted by default
explorerSettings.name: Name
explorerSettings.ignoredFoldersDescription: List of folder names to hide (comma separated)
explorerSettings.enableRightClickRenameDescription: Allow renaming conversations via context menu
explorerSettings.enableRightClickRenameDisclaimer: Note: This rename is local only (alias) and does not affect the actual conversation name on Google AI Studio.

favorites.noFavoritesFound: No favorites found matching your filters.
favorites.noFavoritesYet: No favorites yet. Right-click on a file to add it to favorites.

node.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
node.deleteFolderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the folder "{{name}}" and all its contents?
node.deleteNote: Note: Deleted items can be restored by re-importing them from AI Studio.
node.deleteFolderNote: Note: Deleted folders cannot be restored, but conversations can be re-imported from AI Studio.

batch.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the selected items?

tags.noTagsYet: No tags yet. Create one above.
tags.deleteTagConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this tag?

options.title: Better Sidebar for Google AI Studio Options

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear your thoughts, suggestions, or bug reports.
feedback.name: Name

dataManagement.resetDatabaseConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all stored data? This cannot be undone.

search.title: Search
search.foldersIncludeTooltip: Separate multiple folder names with commas (e.g. 'project a, work, personal')
search.foldersExcludeTooltip: Separate multiple folder names with commas (e.g. 'archive, temp')
search.indexingInfoIntro: The extension only records and indexes conversations visited after installation. Previous history is not searchable by default.
search.indexingImport: Import History: Use the import feature to load your conversation history.
search.indexingScan: Scan Library: Ensure the Explorer has scanned and imported your library to index all titles.
search.whyNoOlder: Why can't I find older conversations?

importHistory.selectZipHint: Select the ZIP file downloaded from Google Drive containing your chat history.
importHistory.step2Click: Click the "Open in Drive" button at the top right.
importHistory.step3Click: In Google Drive, click the "AI Studio" folder dropdown and select "Download". Google will zip your files.
importHistory.step4Upload: Once downloaded, upload the ZIP file below.
importHistory.noteMatch: Conversations are matched by title. Some conversations may not be imported if the title cannot be found in the local database.
importHistory.noteImages: All image resources within the conversations will be ignored during import.
